scripts.cy:run: npx cypress run --config video=false --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.cy:tests:run: npx cypress run --config video=false --browser chrome --spec 'cypress/e2e/US_11_Education/**.js' --env allure=true
scripts.allure:report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.allure:clear: rm -r allure-results/ allure-report cypress/screenshots cypress/videos || true
scripts.allure:history: mv -f allure-report/history allure-results/history && rm -r allure-report || true
